sentence.Network_en: They discussed the abnegation of God.
Men with that capacity for self - abnegation do not reach a Presidency.
sentence.Network_cn: 具有那样 自我 克制能力的人根本当不了总统.

sentence.Network_en: Such abnegation has become a popular tactic in these anti - political times.
sentence.Network_cn: 这已成为 反 政府时代的流行伎俩.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Latin abnegatio(n-), from the verb abnegare (see abnegate)

means.word_mean: 1. the denial and rejection of a doctrine or belief;
2. renunciation of your own interests in favor of the interests of others
